pages.text: Profanum is a new metal added by Terramity.$(br2)Profanum is used for nyxium, exodium, and reverium ingots.$(br2)Profanum ore can be found deep in the overworld between Y=-10 and Y=-64.

pages.title: Profanum
pages.text: Profanum is an incredible base for powerful alloys.
Profanum is dangerous to the touch, watch out if you intend to smelt it.$(br2)The ore can only be mined by a hellspec, void, or conductite pickaxe (or better).
